results.title: Report a missed bin collection - Wakefield Council
results.snippet: If your bin was missed today, you should wait until after 5pm to report it to us. All bins must be out at 7:00 am when collections start.

results.title: Report a missed bin - Wakefield MyAccount
results.snippet: Report a missed bin collection quickly and easily at Wakefield Council's online portal. Submit your request and get assistance with waste collection ...

results.title: Request a new or replacement bin - Wakefield Council
results.snippet: New bins, including new bins for new house builds, and bins that are reported as missing or stolen cost £26.51 for each replacement bin.

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin collection - Wakefield Council
strengths: Direct link to report a missed bin collection.
Provides clear instructions on the bin reporting process.
selected_links.reasoning: The title and URL of this link suggest it is the most direct way for users to report missed bin collections to Wakefield Council, aligning with the original search intent.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides a link to report a missed bin collection, but does not specifically mention what to do if you forgot to put your bin out on the scheduled day. However, I can assume that reporting a missed bin collection would allow me to specify why it was not put out, assuming that there is an option for such an explanation.
Reason.next_actions: Click the 'Report a missed bin collection' link and describe why the bin was not put out.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides a clear way to report or request bin-related services. However, it could benefit from more explicit instructions on procedures for specific situations such as forgotten collections. Overall satisfaction level: 80%
